name: Strange Statue
description:
You come across a peculiar statue with outstretched arms. In its hands are a golden idol and a small potion.
The statue's plaque reads: 'Take only one.'

choices.resultText:
As you take the golden idol, the statue's eyes glow red.
The floor begins to shake, and you feel a sharp pain in your chest.
You've been cursed! But at least you're 50 gold richer.

You lost 10 HP, but gained 50 Gold.

You take the small potion and drink it. A warm sensation spreads through your body.
You feel stronger and more resilient.

Your maximum HP increased by 15!

You attack the statue with all your might. It crumbles to dust, revealing a glowing card inside.
You lost 5 HP, but obtained a new card: Strike+!
You decide it's best not to disturb ancient artifacts. You turn and leave the statue behind.
